title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 6) Order, 2020
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 363
Gazette dated Friday, 17th July, 2020
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.63 OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 6)
Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.6)
Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
timeof
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
returningofficeronThursday,9thJuly,2020,between0900hours forelection
and1500hours.
3. ThecampaignperiodshallcommenceonThursday,9thJuly,
Campaign
2020,at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday,29th period
July,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 30th andtimesof
poll
July,2020,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninadistrictandwardifonlyone
candidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
364 StatutoryInstruments 17thJuly,2020
SCHEDULE
(Paragraphs2and4)
